channel.title: css-quiz
channel.description: Learn css fundamentals through fun and challenging quizzes!

item.title: Which one is the CSS preprocessor
item.description: To use a CSS preprocessor, you must install a CSS compiler on your web server. Here are a few of the most popular CSS preprocessors.
item.content:encoded: To use a CSS preprocessor, you must install a CSS compiler on your web server. Here are a few of the most popular CSS preprocessors.

item.title: One way to not import css
item.description: is usually used for or practical purposes. is usually when you have a separate file for your css. are recommended to be inside the headâ€¦
item.content:encoded:
Inline style is usually used for specificity or practical purposes.
Link tag is usually when you have a separate file for your css.
Style tag are recommended to be inside the head block as recommended here

item.title: What does css stand for
item.description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and lay out web pages. Read for detail here
item.content:encoded:
CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and lay out web pages.

Read for detail here
